title: Fight for the Villagers (4C273)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Rohan
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish: Make a [Rohan] Man strength +2 (or +3 if you spot a villager).
Lore:	”'Bar the gates, set a watch on the surrounds, and get the women and children to the caves.'”
Rarity:	C
